description: This file contains the implementation of the UserService class, which manages user registration, retrieval, password verification, and provides a UserDetailsService implementation for authentication purposes in a Spring Boot application.

classes.name: UserService
classes.description: Service class implementing user management functions and UserDetailsService for Spring Security integration.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Registers a new user with email and password, storing the password securely.

methods.name: findByEmail
methods.description: Retrieves a user based on their email address.

methods.name: verifyPassword
methods.description: Verifies if a raw password matches the stored hash.

methods.name: loadUserByUsername
methods.description: Loads user details for Spring Security authentication.
